prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
ABDUL KAREEM SHAIK
Phone: 8790060188	Email: kareemmunna2001@gmail.com
Carrer Objective
To be able to utilize my skills, creativity, knowledge and potential to utmost levels in a challenging and dynamic environment, with an opportunity of working with diverse group of people and enhancing my professional skills through continuous learning and experience.
Education
Bachelor of Technology | Anil Neerukonda Institute of Technology and Sciences
Electronics and Communication Engineering (ECE) | CGPA: 8.8	Aug 2019 – Apr 2023
Board of Intermediate | Narayana Junior College	Jun 2017 – Mar 2019
Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry (MPC) | CGPA: 9.83
Board of Secondary School | Sree Krishna Grammar School	Apr 2016 – Mar 2017
Central Board Secondary Education | CGPA: 9.7
Projects
Kodbook - A Social Media App
A social media platform allowing users to create posts, like and comment on posts, view posts on a newsfeed, and display profile information.
Developed a dynamic newsfeed displaying all posts, including likes and comments functionality.
Implemented a user profile feature to display personal details of the logged-in user, and edit the details of the user.
Created a post-creation module for users.
Ensured a responsive UI and smooth user experience across different devices.
Achievements: Improved user engagement through real-time updates, optimized database queries for faster loading times, and enhanced app security with authentication protocols.
Technical Skills
Programming Languages: Java, Python
Database: MySQL
HTML, CSS
Frameworks: JDBC, Hibernate, Spring
Achievements
Java Full Stack Internship Certificate
KodNest, Bangalore | February 2024 to October 2024
Completed hands-on projects using Java, Spring Boot, HTML, CSS and MySQL.
Certificate of Participation for showcasing how to control electrical appliances using a bluetooth module and a AURDINO UNO board.
Trainings
Java Full Stack Internship
KodNest, Bangalore | February 2024 to October 2024
Engaged in comprehensive traini
completion: This resume belongs to a candidate with [insert summary based on content, e.g., 5 years of software engineering experience, skilled in Python and Java].
